mapper.insert:
insert into t_select_questions ( sq_desc, select_a, select_b, select_c, select_d,select_answer,question_type,paper_type) values
( #{item.sqDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{item.selectA,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{item.selectB,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{item.selectC,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{item.selectD,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{item.selectAnswer,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},1,#{item.paperType,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_select_questions set sq_desc = #{sqDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, select_a = #{selectA,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, select_b = #{selectB,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, select_c = #{selectC,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, select_d = #{selectD,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, select_answer = #{selectD,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where sq_id = #{sqId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select sq_id, question_type, paper_type, sq_desc, select_a, select_b, select_c, select_d, select_answer from t_select_questions where sq_id = #{sqId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select sq_id, question_type, paper_type, sq_desc, select_a, select_b, select_c, select_d, select_answer from t_select_questions
